Even the brave are scared by a lion three times: first by its tracks, again by its roar, and one last time face to face.

Whenever enchanted creature deals damage, you gain that much life.

rulings.text: You only gain the life when the triggered ability resolves. If you are reduced to zero life before the ability resolves, you will lose before gaining the life.

You gain life for all damage which is not prevented, regardless of what the creature damages (player or another creature) or the toughness of the blocking creature. If you put this on a 5/5 and it is blocked by a 1/1, you still gain 5 life.

cards.name: Worship
cards.text: If you control a creature, damage that would reduce your life total to less than 1 reduces it to 1 instead.
cards.flavorText:
"Believe in the ideal, not the idol."
—Serra

rulings.text: It reduces your life total to 1, not the damage to 1.

Worship does not prevent damage. It causes some damage to be unable to lower your life total. So any damage rendered useless by Worship was still dealt and is counted by effects that track the amount of damage done to a player. In addition, Worship does not prevent loss of life, so loss of life bypasses Worship.

cards.name: Battle of Wits
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have 200 or more cards in your library, you win the game.
cards.flavorText: The wizard who reads a thousand books is powerful. The wizard who memorizes a thousand books is insane.

rulings.text: Battle of Wits has an “intervening ‘if’ clause.” This means that if you don’t have 200 or more cards in your library at the beginning of your upkeep, the ability won’t trigger. If the ability does trigger, but you have fewer than 200 cards in your library when the ability resolves, the ability will do nothing.
In tournaments, you must be able to shuffle your entire deck within a reasonable amount of time.

foreignData.flavorText: Ein Zauberer, der tausend Bücher gelesen hat, ist mächtig. Ein Zauberer, der tausend Bücher auswendig gelernt hat, ist irre.

cards.name: Clone
cards.text: You may have Clone enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield.

rulings.text: If the chosen creature is copying something else (for example, if the chosen creature is another Clone), then your Clone enters the battlefield as whatever the chosen creature copied.
If the chosen creature is a token, Clone copies the original characteristics of that token as stated by the effect that put it onto the battlefield. Clone is not a token.

Any enters-the-battlefield abilities of the copied creature will trigger when Clone enters the battlefield. Any “as [this creature] enters the battlefield” or “[this creature] enters the battlefield with” abilities of the chosen creature will also work.
If the chosen creature has {X} in its mana cost (such as Protean Hydra), X is considered to be zero.

Clone copies exactly what was printed on the original creature and nothing more (unless that creature is copying something else or is a token; see below). It doesn't copy whether that creature is tapped or untapped, whether it has any counters on it or Auras attached to it, or any non-copy effects that have changed its power, toughness, types, color, or so on.
If Clone somehow enters the battlefield at the same time as another creature, Clone can't become a copy of that creature. You may choose only a creature that's already on the battlefield.
You can choose not to copy anything. In that case, Clone enters the battlefield as a 0/0 Shapeshifter creature, and is probably put into the graveyard immediately.
Clone's ability doesn't target the chosen creature.

cards.name: Exhaustion
cards.text: Creatures and lands target opponent controls don't untap during their next untap step.
cards.flavorText: Tired doesn't even begin to cover it.

rulings.text: The creatures and lands are only prevented from untapping during the targeted player’s next untap step. They can still can untap during other player’s untap steps.
No creatures or lands controlled by the player will untap during their next untap step. This includes those which entered the battlefield after Exhaustion resolved.

foreignData.flavorText: Müde ist noch ein viel zu schwacher Ausdruck dafür.
foreignData.name: Erschöpfung
foreignData.text: Kreaturen und Länder, die ein Gegner deiner Wahl kontrolliert, enttappen nicht während seines nächsten Enttappsegments.

foreignData.flavorText: Es mucho más que cansancio.
foreignData.name: Agotamiento
foreignData.text: Las criaturas y las tierras que controla el oponente objetivo no se enderezan durante su próximo paso de enderezar.

foreignData.flavorText: Vous ne savez pas ce que le mot fatigue veut dire, croyez-moi.

foreignData.text: Les créatures et les terrains contrôlés par l'adversaire ciblé ne se dégagent pas pendant sa prochaine étape de dégagement.

foreignData.flavorText: Dire che sono stanco non rende neppure minimamente l'idea.

foreignData.flavorText: Cansado não é nem o começo.

foreignData.flavorText: Уставший человек даже не пытается справиться с ним.

cards.name: Mind Bend
cards.text: Change the text of target permanent by replacing all instances of one color word with another or one basic land type with another. (For example, you may change "nonblack creature" to "nongreen creature" or "forestwalk" to "islandwalk." This effect lasts indefinitely.)

rulings.text: Can target a card with no appropriate words on it, or even one with no words at all.
It can’t change a word to the same word. It must be a different word.
Alters all occurrences of the chosen word in the text box and the type line of the given card.
It only changes what is printed on the card (or set on a token when it was created or set by a copy effect). It will not change any effects that are on the permanent.
You choose the words to change on resolution.
You can’t change proper nouns (i.e. card names) such as “Island Fish Jasconius”.
It can be used to change a land’s type from one basic land type to another. For example, Forest can be changed to Island so it produces blue mana. It doesn’t change the name of any permanent.

foreignData.name: Bewusstseinserweiterung
foreignData.text: Verändere den Text einer bleibenden Karte deiner Wahl, indem du im Text alle Vorkommen eines Farbwortes durch ein anderes oder alle Vorkommen eines Standardlandtyps durch ein anderes ersetzt. (Zum Beispiel kannst du „nichtschwarze Kreatur" in „nichtgrüne Kreatur" umändern oder „Waldtarnung" in „Ebenentarnung". Dieser Effekt endet nicht am Ende des Zuges.)

foreignData.name: Torsión mental
foreignData.text: Cambia el texto del permanente objetivo reemplazando todas las menciones de un color por otro o un tipo de tierra básica por otro. (Por ejemplo, puedes cambiar "criatura que no sea negra" por "criatura que no sea verde" o "cruza bosques" por "cruza llanuras". Este efecto no termina al final del turno.)

foreignData.name: Ploiement mental
foreignData.text: Changez le texte de règles d'un permanent ciblé en remplaçant toutes les occurrences d'un nom de couleur par un autre nom de couleur ou d'un type de terrain de base par un autre. (Par exemple, vous pouvez remplacer « créature non-noire » par « créature non-verte » ou « traversée des forêts » par « traversée des plaines. » Cet effet ne s'arrête pas à la fin du tour.)

foreignData.name: Piegare la Mente
foreignData.text: Cambia il testo di un permanente bersaglio sostituendo tutte le occorrenze di un nome di colore con un altro o il tipo di una terra base con un altro. (Per esempio, puoi cambiare "creatura non nera" in "creatura non verde" o "passa-foreste" in "passa-pianure". Questo effetto non termina alla fine del turno.)

foreignData.name: 幻覚
foreignData.text: パーマネント１つを対象とする。それに書かれた色を表す言葉１種類をすべて別な色に置き換えるか、基本土地タイプ１種類をすべて別な基本土地タイプに置き換える。 （例えば、あなたは「黒でないクリーチャー」を「緑でないクリーチャー」に置き換えたり、「森渡り」を「平地渡り」に置き換えたりしてよい。この効果はターン終了時に終わらない。）

foreignData.name: Contraverter a Mente

(Por exemplo, você pode mudar "criatura que não seja preta" para "criatura que não seja verde" ou "travessia de floresta" para "travessia de planície". Este efeito não cessa no final do turno.)

cards.name: Plagiarize
cards.text: Until end of turn, if target player would draw a card, instead that player skips that draw and you draw a card.
cards.flavorText: "Are you thinking what I'm thinking?"

rulings.text: If you target yourself, this spell has no useful effect. It will not cause an infinite loop since a replacement effect can’t modify the same event more than once. This effect will not modify the draw that it has you perform.
You draw the card from your library as normal, not from your opponent’s library.

If you and your opponent each cast Plagiarize on each other during the same turn, the two spells effectively cancel each other out. You will draw cards when you normally would and so will your opponent.

If you target a player whose library is empty, any effect or turn-based action that would cause that player to draw a card will cause you to draw a card instead. It doesn’t matter that the other player would be unable to draw.

cards.name: Polymorph
cards.text: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated. Its controller reveals cards from the top of their library until they reveal a creature card. The player puts that card onto the battlefield, then shuffles all other cards revealed this way into their library.

rulings.text: If there are no creatures in the player’s library, then the target creature is still destroyed, you see all the cards in that player’s library, and then they shuffle and continue play.
If the targeted creature is an illegal target by the time Polymorph would resolve, the entire spell doesn’t resolve. Nothing else happens.
If there are no creature cards in the player’s library, all the cards in that library are revealed, then the library is shuffled. (The targeted creature remains destroyed.)
A “creature card” is any card with the type creature, even if it has other types such as artifact, enchantment, or land. Older cards of type summon are also creature cards.
If the targeted creature has indestructible, it’s still a legal target — it just isn’t destroyed. The rest of Polymorph’s effect happens as normal.

foreignData.name: Polymorph
foreignData.text: Zerstöre eine Kreatur deiner Wahl. Sie kann nicht regeneriert werden. Ihr Beherrscher deckt Karten oben von seiner Bibliothek auf, bis er eine Kreaturenkarte aufdeckt. Der Spieler bringt diese Karte ins Spiel und mischt alle anderen auf diese Weise aufgedeckten Karten in seine Bibliothek.

foreignData.name: Transmutar
foreignData.text: Destruye la criatura objetivo. No puede ser regenerada. El controlador de esa criatura muestra cartas de la parte superior de su biblioteca hasta que muestre una carta de criatura. Ese jugador pone esa carta en juego y baraja todas las otras cartas mostradas de esta manera en su biblioteca.

foreignData.name: Polymorphisme
foreignData.text: Détruisez la créature ciblée. Elle ne peut pas être régénérée. Son contrôleur révèle les cartes du dessus de sa bibliothèque jusqu'à ce qu'il révèle une carte de créature. Ce joueur met en jeu cette carte et mélange toutes les autres cartes révélées de cette manière dans sa bibliothèque.

foreignData.name: Polimorfismo
foreignData.text: Distruggi una creatura bersaglio. Non può essere rigenerata. Il suo controllore rivela carte dalla cima del proprio grimorio fino a quando rivela una carta creatura. Il giocatore mette in gioco quella carta e rimescola nel proprio grimorio tutte le altre carte rivelate in questo modo.

foreignData.name: 変身

foreignData.name: Polimorfismo

O jogador coloca aquele card em jogo e embaralha todos os outros cards revelados dessa maneira em seu próprio grimório.

cards.name: Rewind
cards.text: Counter target spell. Untap up to four lands.
cards.flavorText: "Let's go over this one more time. . . ."

rulings.text: Rewind targets only a spell. It doesn’t target any lands. The lands are chosen as Rewind resolves.
You can choose up to four lands, no matter who controls any of them. Those lands untap once. You can’t choose one land and have it untap four times, for example.

If the spell is an illegal target when Rewind tries to resolve, perhaps because it was countered by another spell or ability, Rewind won’t resolve and none of its effects will happen. You won’t untap any lands.

Vuela. (Esta criatura no puede ser bloqueada excepto por criaturas que tengan la habilidad de volar.)
Siempre que la Urraca ladrona haga daño a un oponente, robas una carta.

foreignData.flavorText: Les autres oiseaux cherchent des brindilles pour leurs nids. La pie préfère les joyaux.
foreignData.name: Pie voleuse
foreignData.text:
Vol (Cette créature ne peut être bloquée que par des créatures avec le vol.)
À chaque fois que la Pie voleuse inflige des blessures à un adversaire, vous piochez une carte.

foreignData.flavorText: Gli altri uccelli raccolgono ramoscelli per costruire i loro nidi. Le gazze rubano gioielli per adornare i propri.
foreignData.name: Gazza Ladra
foreignData.text:
Volare (Questa creatura non può essere bloccata tranne che da creature con volare.)
Ogniqualvolta la Gazza Ladra infligge danno a un avversario, tu peschi una carta.

foreignData.flavorText: 他の鳥は巣を作るために小枝を集める。 カササギは巣を作るために宝石を盗むんだ。
foreignData.name: 泥棒カササギ
foreignData.text:
飛行 （このクリーチャーは飛行を持たないクリーチャーによってブロックされない。）
泥棒カササギが対戦相手１人にダメージを与えるたび、あなたはカードを１枚引く。

foreignData.flavorText: Os outros pássaros coletam gravetos para seus ninhos. As gralhas roubam jóias para os delas.
foreignData.name: Gralha Larápia
foreignData.text:
Voar (Esta criatura só pode ser bloqueada por criaturas com a habilidade de voar.)
Toda vez que Gralha Larápia causar dano a um oponente, você compra um card.

foreignData.flavorText: Обычные птицы несут в гнездо веточки. Сороки же в гнездо несут драгоценности.
foreignData.name: Сорока-воровка
foreignData.text:
Полет (Это существо может быть блокировано только существом со способностью полета).
Каждый раз, когда Сорока-воровка наносит оппоненту повреждения, вы берете карту.

foreignData.flavorText: 一般鸟儿收集细枝筑巢， 鹊则是偷窃宝石来筑巢。
foreignData.name: 窃鹊
foreignData.text:
飞行（只有具飞行异能的生物才能阻挡它。）
每当窃鹊向对手造成伤害时，你抓一张牌。

cards.name: Thought Courier
cards.text: {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
cards.flavorText: "There's an assortment to satisfy all your needs: deep, fleeting, dirty, pure, scientific, philosophical, after, and even fore. For a price."

foreignData.flavorText: „Es ist für jeden etwas dabei: tiefe Gedanken, flüchtige, schmutzige, reine, wissenschaftliche, philosophische, falsche und richtige. Hat alles nur seinen Preis."
foreignData.name: Gedankenübermittler
foreignData.text: {T}: Ziehe eine Karte und wirf dann eine Karte aus deiner Hand ab.

foreignData.flavorText: "Existe un surtido para satisfacer todas tus necesitades: profundo, fugaz, sucio, puro, científico, filosófico, reflexivo e incluso premonitorio. Por un precio."
foreignData.name: Mensajero del pensamiento
foreignData.text: {T}: Roba una carta, luego descarta una carta.

foreignData.flavorText: « J'ai des pensées pour tous les goûts : profondes, fugaces, érotiques, pures, scientifiques, philosophiques, arrières et même mauvaises. Il faut juste y mettre le prix. »
foreignData.name: Messager des pensées
foreignData.text: {T} : Piochez une carte, puis défaussez-vous d'une carte.

foreignData.flavorText: "C'è un assortimento sufficiente a soddisfare tutti i tuoi bisogni: profondo, fuggevole, sporco, puro, scientifico, filosofico, posteriore e anche anteriore. Per il giusto prezzo."
foreignData.name: Messaggero Psichico
foreignData.text: {T}: Pesca una carta, poi scarta una carta.

foreignData.flavorText: ご希望を満たす物なら一通りありますよ。沈思、逡巡、姑息、純粋、理論、空論、回顧、それに予知あたりも。 いずれもお値打ちです。
foreignData.name: 思考の急使
foreignData.text: {T}：カードを１枚引き、その後カードを１枚捨てる。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 人間・ウィザード

foreignData.flavorText: "Existe um sortimento para satisfazer todas as suas necessidades: profundo, fugaz, sujo, puro, científico, filosófico, posterior, e até anterior. Por um preço."
foreignData.name: Mensageiro de Pensamentos
foreignData.text: {T}: Compre um card e depois descarte um card.

foreignData.flavorText: "У меня есть мысли на все случаи жизни: глубокие и мимолетные, чистые, грязные, научные, философские, мысли, приходящие слишком поздно, и даже предвидения. Но не бесплатно".
foreignData.name: Посланник мысли
foreignData.text: {T}: Возьмите карту, затем сбросьте карту.

foreignData.flavorText: 「有种类别可以满足你所有需求：专注，浮动，污秽，纯净，科学，哲理，之后，甚至事前。 只要点代价。」
foreignData.name: 心念讯使
foreignData.text: {T}：抓一张牌，然后弃一张牌。

cards.name: Tidal Kraken
cards.text: Tidal Kraken can't be blocked.
cards.flavorText: To merfolk, pirates are a nuisance. To pirates, merfolk are a threat. To the kraken, they're both appetizers.

foreignData.flavorText: Für Meermänner sind Piraten lästig. Für Piraten sind Meermänner gefährlich. Für den Kraken sind sie alle nur lecker.
foreignData.name: Gezeitenkrake
foreignData.text: Der Gezeitenkrake ist unblockbar.

foreignData.flavorText: Para los tritones, los piratas son una molestia. Para los piratas, los tritones son una amenaza. Para el kraken, ambos son aperitivos.
foreignData.name: Kraken de la marea
foreignData.text: El Kraken de la marea es imbloqueable.

foreignData.flavorText: Pour les ondins, les pirates sont une nuisance. Pour les pirates, les ondins sont une menace. Pour le kraken, pirates et ondins sont des amuse-gueule.
foreignData.name: Kraken des marées
foreignData.text: Le Kraken des marées est imblocable.

foreignData.flavorText: Per i tritoni, i pirati sono una seccatura. Per i pirati, i tritoni sono una minaccia. Per il kraken, sono entrambi degli spuntini.
foreignData.name: Kraken delle Maree
foreignData.text: Il Kraken delle Maree non può essere bloccato.

foreignData.flavorText: マーフォークにとって海賊は厄介者だ。 海賊にとってマーフォークは脅威だ。 しかしクラーケンにとって、そのどちらも食欲を増進させるオードブルのようなものだ。
foreignData.name: 高潮のクラーケン
foreignData.text: 高潮のクラーケンはブロックされない。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — クラーケン

foreignData.flavorText: Para os tritões, os piratas são um incômodo. Para os piratas, os tritões são uma ameaça. Para os krakens, são ambos aperitivos.
foreignData.name: Kraken das Marés
foreignData.text: Kraken das Marés não pode ser bloqueado.

foreignData.flavorText: Для обитателей моря пираты неприятность. Для пиратов обитатели моря опасность. Для кракена и те, и другие вкусный обед.
foreignData.name: Приливный кракен
foreignData.text: Приливного кракена невозможно блокировать.

foreignData.flavorText: 对人鱼而言，海盗是麻烦； 而对海盗来说，人鱼是威胁。 但对巨怪来说，他们都是开胃菜。
foreignData.name: 潮汐巨怪
foreignData.text: 潮汐巨怪不能被阻挡。

cards.name: Tidings
cards.text: Draw four cards.
cards.flavorText:
"Though the letter was many pages long, I could tell all I needed to know from one look at the messenger's face."
—Barrin, master wizard

foreignData.flavorText: „Auch wenn der Brief viele Seiten lang war, wusste ich alles, was ich wissen musste, nach einem Blick auf das Gesicht des Überbringers." —Barrin, Meisterzauberer
foreignData.name: Botschaft
foreignData.text: Ziehe vier Karten.

foreignData.flavorText: "Aunque la carta tenía varias páginas, puedo afirmar que todo lo que necesitaba saber lo supe con mirar la cara del mensajero." —Barrin, mago experto
foreignData.name: Informes
foreignData.text: Roba cuatro cartas.

foreignData.flavorText: « Les bonnes nouvelles sont toujours retardées, et les mauvaises ont des ailes. » —Voltaire
foreignData.name: Nouvelles
foreignData.text: Piochez quatre cartes.

foreignData.flavorText: "Nonostante la lettera contenesse diverse pagine, mi bastò uno sguardo al volto del messaggero per capire tutto." —Barrin, mago insegnante
foreignData.name: Novelle
foreignData.text: Pesca quattro carte.

foreignData.flavorText: 手紙は何枚にも渡っていたけど、知りたかったことはすべて使者の顔を一目見ればわかったよ。 ――練達の魔術師バリン
foreignData.name: 連絡
foreignData.text: カードを４枚引く。

foreignData.flavorText: "Embora a carta se estendesse por muitas e muitas páginas, fiquei sabendo de tudo o que precisava com apenas um olhar para o rosto do mensageiro." — Barrin, mago mestre
foreignData.name: Novidades
foreignData.text: Compre quatro cards.

foreignData.flavorText: "Хотя посланник принес письмо, написанное на нескольких листах, все, что мне надо было, я мог узнать, лишь взглянув на его лицо". — Баррин, главный мудрец
foreignData.name: Вести
foreignData.text: Возьмите четыре карты.

foreignData.flavorText: 「虽然信件长达数页，我只要瞧瞧信差的表情便能晓得重点。」 ～法术大师巴林
foreignData.name: 音信
foreignData.text: 抓四张牌。

cards.name: Time Ebb
cards.text: Put target creature on top of its owner's library.
cards.flavorText: Like the tide, time both ebbs and flows.

foreignData.flavorText: Du musst noch viel ruhiger werden ...
foreignData.name: Zeitebbe
foreignData.text: Lege eine Kreatur deiner Wahl oben auf die Bibliothek ihres Besitzers.

foreignData.flavorText: Como la marea, el tiempo fluye y regresa.
foreignData.name: La compensación del tiempo
foreignData.text: Pon el permanente objetivo en la parte superior de la biblioteca de su propietario.

foreignData.flavorText: Le temps subit les mêmes marées que l'océan.
foreignData.name: Temps du jusant
foreignData.text: Mettez la créature ciblée au-dessus de la bibliothèque de son propriétaire.

foreignData.flavorText: Come la marea, il tempo fluisce e rifluisce.
foreignData.name: Riflusso Temporale
foreignData.text: Metti una creatura bersaglio in cima al grimorio del suo proprietario.

foreignData.flavorText: 海と同じく、時も満ち干を繰り返す。
foreignData.name: 時の引き潮
foreignData.text: クリーチャー１体を対象とし、それをオーナーのライブラリーの一番上に置く。

foreignData.flavorText: Como a maré, o tempo reflui.
foreignData.name: Refluxo do Tempo
foreignData.text: Coloca a criatura alvo no topo do grimório de seu dono.

foreignData.flavorText: Словно морская волна, время приходит и отходит.
foreignData.name: Временной отлив
foreignData.text: Положите целевое существо в библиотеку владельца сверху.

foreignData.flavorText: 时光涨落如潮汐。
foreignData.name: 时光退潮
foreignData.text: 将目标生物置于其拥有者的牌库顶。

cards.name: Trade Routes
cards.text:
{1}: Return target land you control to its owner's hand.
{1}, Discard a land card: Draw a card.
cards.flavorText: The wise, the righteous, the mighty—the merchant feeds them all.

foreignData.flavorText: Die Weisen, die Rechtschaffenen, die Mächtigen sie alle könnten ohne den Kaufmann nicht überleben.
foreignData.name: Handelsrouten
foreignData.text:
{1}: Bringe ein Land deiner Wahl, das du kontrollierst, auf die Hand seines Besitzers zurück.
{1}, wirf ein Land aus deiner Hand ab: Ziehe eine Karte.

foreignData.flavorText: El comerciante alimenta a todos: al sabio, al justo, al poderoso.
foreignData.name: Rutas comerciales
foreignData.text:
{1}: Regresa la tierra objetivo que controles a la mano de su propietario.
{1}, descartar una carta de tierra de tu mano: Roba una carta.

foreignData.flavorText: Sage, juste, puissant — qui que vous soyez, le marchand vous nourrit.
foreignData.name: Routes marchandes
foreignData.text:
{1} : Renvoyez le terrain ciblé que vous contrôlez dans la main de son propriétaire.
{1}, défaussez-vous d'une carte de terrain : Piochez une carte.

foreignData.flavorText: Il saggio, il giusto, il potente: sono i mercanti a nutrirli tutti quanti.
foreignData.name: Rotte Commerciali
foreignData.text:
{1}: Il proprietario riprende in mano una terra bersaglio che tu controlli.
{1}, Scarta una carta terra: Pesca una carta.

foreignData.flavorText: 賢き者、正しき者、力ある者――すべてを支えるのは商う者。
foreignData.name: 交易路
foreignData.text:
{1}：あなたがコントロールする土地１つを対象とし、それをオーナーの手札に戻す。
{1}, 土地カードを１枚捨てる：カードを１枚引く。

foreignData.flavorText: Os sábios, os justos, os fortes o mercador alimenta a todos.
foreignData.name: Rotas de Comércio
foreignData.text:
{1}: Devolve o terreno alvo que você controla para a mão de seu dono.
{1}, Descarte um card de terreno: Compre um card.

foreignData.flavorText: Мудрого, справедливого, властного всех их кормит торговец.
foreignData.name: Торговые пути
foreignData.text:
{1}: Верните целевую землю, которую вы контролируете, в руку владельца.
{1}, Сбросьте карту земли: возьмите карту.

foreignData.flavorText: 智者，仁者，勇者～商人都能搞定。
foreignData.name: 贸易路线
foreignData.text:
{1}：将目标由你操控的地移回其拥有者手上。
{1}，弃掉一张地牌：抓一张牌。

cards.name: Traumatize
cards.text: Target player mills half their library, rounded down.
cards.flavorText: You won't know what you're missing.

rulings.text: The player can put the cards in their graveyard in any order they choose.

foreignData.flavorText: Du wirst gar nicht wissen, was dir fehlt.
foreignData.name: Traumatisierung
foreignData.text: Ein Spieler deiner Wahl legt die obere Hälfte seiner Bibliothek (abgerundet) auf seinen Friedhof.

foreignData.flavorText: No sabrás lo que te pierdes.
foreignData.name: Traumatizar
foreignData.text: El jugador objetivo pone la mitad superior de su biblioteca, redondeada hacia abajo, en su cementerio.

foreignData.flavorText: Vous ne savez pas ce qui va vous manquer.
foreignData.name: Traumatisme
foreignData.text: Le joueur ciblé met la moitié des cartes (arrondie à l'inférieur) du dessus de sa bibliothèque dans son cimetière.

foreignData.flavorText: Non ti sarà dato sapere cosa ti stai perdendo.
foreignData.name: Traumatizzare
foreignData.text: Il giocatore bersaglio mette la metà superiore del proprio grimorio, arrotondata per difetto, nel proprio cimitero.

foreignData.flavorText: 失ったものなんて知らなくてもいいさ。
foreignData.name: 心の傷跡
foreignData.text: プレイヤー１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーは、自分のライブラリーの上から半分（端数は切捨て）を自分の墓地に置く。

foreignData.flavorText: Você não vai saber o que está perdendo.
foreignData.name: Traumatizar
foreignData.text: O jogador alvo coloca a metade superior de seu próprio grimório, arredondada para baixo, em seu próprio cemitério.

foreignData.flavorText: Вы не знаете, что теряете.
foreignData.name: Травма
foreignData.text: Целевой игрок перемещает верхнюю половину библиотеки (округлять в меньшую сторону) на свое кладбище.

foreignData.flavorText: 你不会晓得自己少了什么。
foreignData.name: 精神受创
foreignData.text: 目标牌手将其牌库从顶上算起一半数量的牌置入其坟墓场，小数点以下舍去。

cards.flavorText:
"Wealth means power; the power to subdue, to crush, to exploit, the power to enslave, to outrage, to degrade."
—Emma Goldman, "Anarchism"

foreignData.flavorText: „... der Mensch begehrt alles an sich zu reißen, um nur nach Belieben damit schalten und walten zu können." —Johann Wolfgang von Goethe, „Lehrjahre"
foreignData.name: Schatzhort
foreignData.text: {2}{U}{U}: Ziehe eine Karte.

foreignData.flavorText: "La riqueza es poder; el poder de someter, de aplastar, de explotar, el poder de esclavizar, de ultrajar, de degradar." —Emma Goldman, "Anarquismo"
foreignData.name: Descubrimiento del tesoro
foreignData.text: {2}{U}{U}: Roba una carta.

foreignData.flavorText: « Ou le luxe est l'effet des richesses, ou il les rend nécessaires ; il corrompt à la fois le riche et le pauvre, l'un par la possession, l'autre par la convoitise. » —Jean-Jacques Rousseau
foreignData.name: Caverne au trésor
foreignData.text: {2}{U}{U} : Piochez une carte.

foreignData.flavorText: "La ricchezza significa potere; il potere di sottomettere, di schiacciare, di sfruttare, il potere di schiavizzare, di oltraggiare, di degradare." —Emma Goldman, "Anarchia"
foreignData.name: Tesoro Ritrovato
foreignData.text: {2}{U}{U}: Pesca una carta

foreignData.flavorText: 富は力である。征服し、破壊し、搾取する力であり、隷属させ、踏みにじり、堕落させる力である。 ――エマ・ゴールドマン「無政府主義」

foreignData.flavorText: "A riqueza significa poder; o poder para subjugar, massacrar, explorar, o poder para escravizar, ultrajar, degradar." — Emma Goldman, "Anarquismo"
foreignData.name: Reintegração do Tesouro
foreignData.text: {2}{U}{U}: Compre um card.

foreignData.flavorText: "Богатство это власть, власть подчинять, ломать, использовать, власть порабощать, впадать в бешенство и деградировать". — Эмма Голдман, "Анархизм"
foreignData.name: Сокровищница
foreignData.text: {2}{U}{U}: Возьмите карту.

foreignData.flavorText: 「财富即力量；是征服，压榨，剥削的力量，是奴役，施暴，堕落的力量。」 ～艾玛‧高德曼，「无政府主义」
foreignData.name: 发掘物
foreignData.text: {2}{U}{U}：抓一张牌。

cards.name: Wanderguard Sentry
cards.text: When Wanderguard Sentry enters the battlefield, look at target opponent's hand.
cards.flavorText: It allows those with dangerous weapons to pass. But not those with dangerous thoughts.

foreignData.flavorText: Er gibt denen mit gefährlichen Waffen den Weg frei. Aber nicht denen mit gefährlichen Gedanken.
foreignData.name: Wandergardist-Wachposten
foreignData.text: Wenn der Wandergardist-Wachposten ins Spiel kommt, schaue dir die Karten auf der Hand eines Spielers deiner Wahl an.

foreignData.flavorText: Permite pasar a aquellos con armar peligrosas. Pero no a aquellos con pensamientos peligrosos.
foreignData.name: Centinela vagabundo
foreignData.text: Cuando el Centinela vagabundo entre en juego, mira la mano del oponente objetivo.

foreignData.flavorText: Elle laisse passer ceux qui portent des armes dangereuses. Mais pas ceux dont les pensées sont dangereuses.
foreignData.name: Sentinelle garderrance
foreignData.text: Quand cette Sentinelle garderrance arrive en jeu, regardez la main de l'adversaire ciblé.

foreignData.flavorText: Cede il passo a chi porta armi pericolose. Ma non a chi reca pensieri pericolosi.
foreignData.name: Sentinella Suolocustode
foreignData.text: Quando la Sentinella Suolocustode entra in gioco, guarda la mano di un avversario bersaglio.

foreignData.flavorText: 危険な武器を持つだけなら通してもくれよう。 危険な思想となればそうもいかぬ。
foreignData.name: 地護りの歩哨
foreignData.text: 地護りの歩哨が場に出たとき、対戦相手１人を対象とし、そのプレイヤーの手札を見る。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — ドローン

foreignData.flavorText: Ele permite que passem os que levam armas perigosas. Mas não os que têm pensamentos perigosos.
foreignData.name: Sentinela da Guarda-errante
foreignData.text: Quando Sentinela da Guarda-errante entra em jogo, olhe os cards da mão do oponente alvo.

foreignData.flavorText: Он позволит пройти людям с опасным оружием. Но не с опасными мыслями.
foreignData.name: Караульный
foreignData.text: Когда Караульный вступает в игру, посмотрите руку целевого оппонента.

foreignData.flavorText: 它不会挡下带有危险武器的人， 而是挡下藏着危险思想的。
foreignData.name: 巡卫哨兵
foreignData.text: 当巡卫哨兵进场时，检视目标对手的手牌。

cards.name: Wind Drake
cards.text: Flying
cards.flavorText:
"But high she shoots through air and light, Above all low delay, Where nothing earthly bounds her flight, Nor shadow dims her way."
—Thomas Moore, "Oh that I had Wings"

foreignData.flavorText: „Dort drob schießt sie durch Luft und Licht, Weit über jeder Ruh, Die Last der Erde bind't sie nicht, Kein Schatten setzt ihr zu." —Thomas Moore, „Oh wenn ich Flügel hätt"
foreignData.name: Windsceada
foreignData.text: Fliegend (Diese Kreatur kann nur von fliegenden Kreaturen geblockt werden.)

foreignData.flavorText: "Pero se remonta en lo alto a través del aire y la luz, sobre todos los obstáculos, donde nada terrenal limita su vuelo, y ninguna sombra oscurece su camino." —Thomas Moore, "Oh si tuviera yo alas"
foreignData.name: Draco del viento
foreignData.text: Vuela. (Esta criatura no puede ser bloqueada excepto por criaturas que tengan la habilidad de volar.)

foreignData.flavorText: « L'aigle alors jette au loin ces dépouilles opimes Et, l'aile ouverte au vent, vole vers le soleil. » —Verlaine, Poèmes saturniens
foreignData.name: Drakôn des vents
foreignData.text: Vol (Cette créature ne peut être bloquée que par des créatures avec le vol.)

cards.name: Withering Gaze
cards.text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You draw a card for each Forest and green card in it.
cards.flavorText: "Nature cares not for the knowledge to be gained from its study. Better to bleed it dry, lest its potential be wasted on lizards and leaves."

foreignData.flavorText: „Der Natur braucht das Wissen, das man aus ihrer Betrachtung gewinnt, nicht. Es ist besser, sie auszunutzen, als sie ihre Kraft an Blättern und Eidechsen verschwenden zu lassen."
foreignData.name: Blick des Verderbens
foreignData.text: Ein Gegner deiner Wahl zeigt die Karten auf seiner Hand offen vor. Du ziehst eine Karte für jeden Wald und für jede grüne Karte, die darunter ist.

foreignData.flavorText: "A la naturaleza no le importa el conocimiento obtenido de su estudio. Mejor dejarla seca a que su potencial se desperdicie en lagartos y hojas."
foreignData.name: Mirada abrasadora
foreignData.text: El oponente objetivo muestra su mano. Robas una carta por cada bosque y por cada carta verde que haya ahí.

foreignData.flavorText: « La nature se moque de la connaissance qu'on puisse tirer d'elle. Mieux vaut qu'elle se fane que d'être gaspillée pour des lézards et des feuilles. »
foreignData.name: Regard flétrisseur
foreignData.text: L'adversaire ciblé révèle sa main. Vous piochez une carte pour chaque forêt et chaque carte verte qui s'y trouve.

foreignData.flavorText: "Alla natura non interessa la conoscenza che si può trarre dal suo studio. Meglio svenarla, affinché il suo potenziale non vada sprecato su lucertole e foglie."
foreignData.name: Sguardo Avvizzente
foreignData.text: L'avversario bersaglio rivela la propria mano. Tu peschi una carta per ogni Foresta e per ogni carta verde presente in essa.

foreignData.flavorText: 自然はそこから学ぶことで得られる知識に興味が無い。 ならそれが蜥蜴や葉で無駄にされないよう絞り上げてやれ。
foreignData.name: 萎縮の凝視
foreignData.text: 対戦相手１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーは手札を公開する。 あなたはその中にある森カードか緑のカード１枚につきカードを１枚引く。

foreignData.flavorText: "A natureza não se importa com o conhecimento adquirido por meio de seu estudo. O melhor é esgotá-la por completo, para que seu potencial não seja desperdiçado em folhas e lagartos."
foreignData.name: Olhar Definhador
foreignData.text: O oponente alvo revela sua própria mão. Você compra um card para cada Floresta e para cada card verde que houver nela.

foreignData.flavorText: "Природа не дорожит знаниями, которые можно получить, изучая ее. Возьмите у нее все, что можно, иначе она растратит свои силы на ящериц и листья".
foreignData.name: Опустошительный взгляд

foreignData.flavorText: 「大自然可不在乎能从自身推敲出什么知识。 最好是把它榨干，免得其潜力浪费在蜥蜴与叶子上。」
foreignData.name: 枯萎的凝视
foreignData.text: 目标对手展示其手牌。 其中每有一张树林或绿色牌，你便抓一张牌。

cards.name: Zur's Weirding
cards.text:
Players play with their hands revealed.
If a player would draw a card, they reveal it instead. Then any other player may pay 2 life. If a player does, put that card into its owner's graveyard. Otherwise, that player draws a card.

rulings.text: If someone pays the cost, then the card was never drawn or discarded. It just gets put into the graveyard directly from the library.
This is a continuous replacement effect that modifies a draw.
If a spell or ability causes more than one card to be drawn, draw the cards one at a time and deal with this replacement before drawing the next card.

When using Dredge with this, you have two choices. You can immediately replace the draw with Dredge, or you can apply Zur’s Weirding’s replacement. If the latter, you first resolve Zur’s Weirding’s ability, then if you’re going to draw the card, decide whether or not to replace that draw with Dredge.

foreignData.name: Zurs bizarre Welt
foreignData.text:
Alle Spieler spielen mit offenen Karten.
Falls ein Spieler eine Karte ziehen würde, zeigt er sie stattdessen offen vor. Dann kann jeder andere Spieler 2 Lebenspunkte bezahlen. Falls ein Spieler dies tut, lege die Karte auf den Friedhof ihres Besitzers. Sonst zieht dieser Spieler die Karte.

foreignData.name: Presagio de Zur
foreignData.text:
Los jugadores juegan mostrando sus manos.
Si un jugador fuera a robar una carta, en vez de eso, la muestra. Luego cualquier otro jugador puede pagar 2 vidas. Si algún jugador lo hace, pon esa carta en el cementerio de su propietario. De lo contrario, el jugador roba la carta.

foreignData.name: Déterminisme selon Zur
foreignData.text:
Les joueurs jouent avec leurs mains révélées.
Si un joueur devait piocher une carte, il la révèle à la place. N'importe quel autre joueur peut ensuite payer 2 points de vie. Si c'est le cas, mettez cette carte dans le cimetière de son propriétaire. Sinon, ce joueur pioche la carte.

foreignData.name: Malia di Zur
foreignData.text:
I giocatori giocano a carte scoperte.
Se un giocatore sta per pescare una carta, invece la rivela. Poi ogni altro giocatore può pagare 2 punti vita. Se un giocatore paga, metti quella carta nel cimitero del suo proprietario. Altrimenti, quel giocatore pesca la carta.

foreignData.name: ズアーの運命支配
foreignData.text:
プレイヤーは手札を公開したままプレイする。
いずれかのプレイヤーがカードを１枚引く場合、代わりにそのプレイヤーはそれを公開する。 その後、他のいずれかのプレイヤーは２点のライフを支払ってもよい。 いずれかのプレイヤーがそうした場合、そのカードをオーナーの墓地に置く。 そうでない場合、そのプレイヤーはそのカードを引く。

foreignData.name: Fatalidade de Zur
foreignData.text:
Os jogadores jogam com os cards de suas mãos revelados.
Se um jogador fosse comprar um card, ele próprio o revela em vez disso. Depois, qualquer outro jogador pode pagar 2 pontos de vida. Se um jogador o fizer, coloque aquele card no cemitério de seu dono. Se não, aquele jogador compra o card.

foreignData.name: Предопределение Зура
foreignData.text:
Игроки играют с открытыми руками.
Если игрок берет карту, он открывает ее. Затем любой из игроков может заплатить 2 пункта жизни. Если он это делает, карта помещается на кладбище владельца. В противном случае игрок берет эту карту.

foreignData.name: 祖尔的奥秘
foreignData.text:
牌手以展示手牌的方式进行游戏。
如果任何牌手将要抓一张牌，则他改为展示该牌。 然后其它任何牌手可以支付2点生命。 若有牌手如此做，则将该牌置入其拥有者的坟墓场。 若无人支付，则该牌手抓该张牌。

cards.name: Blackmail

cards.flavorText: In addition to killing peasants, punishing subordinates, and raising an army of nightmares, Braids somehow found time for her favorite hobby: petty extortion.

rulings.text: If the player has less than 3 cards, all of them are revealed.

foreignData.flavorText: Zusätzlich zum wahllosen Töten von Untertanen, Bestrafen von Bediensteten und dem Aufbau einer Armee von Albträumen fand Braids auch noch Zeit für ihr Lieblingshobby: ein klein wenig Erpressung.

cards.text:
Spend only black mana on X.
Consume Spirit deals X damage to any target and you gain X life.
cards.flavorText:
"Your blood, your marrow, your spirit—all are mine."

rulings.text: The amount of life you gain is equal to the number chosen for X, not the amount of damage Consume Spirit deals (in case some of it is prevented).
If the targeted permanent or player is an illegal target by the time Consume Spirit would resolve, the entire spell doesn’t resolve. You won’t gain any life.

cards.name: Sengir Vampire
cards.text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Whenever a creature dealt damage by Sengir Vampire this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Sengir Vampire.
cards.flavorText: Empires rise and fall, but evil is eternal.

rulings.text: If Sengir Vampire deals nonlethal damage to a creature and then a different effect or damage source causes that creature to be put into a graveyard later in the turn, Sengir Vampire’s ability will trigger and it will get a +1/+1 counter.

Each time a creature is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, check whether Sengir Vampire had dealt any damage to it at any time during that turn. If so, Sengir Vampire’s ability will trigger. It doesn’t matter who controlled the creature or whose graveyard it was put into.
If Sengir Vampire and a creature it dealt damage to are both put into a graveyard at the same time, Sengir Vampire’s ability will trigger, but it will do nothing when it resolves.

cards.name: Blood Moon
cards.text: Nonbasic lands are Mountains.
cards.flavorText: Heavy light flooded across the landscape, cloaking everything in deep crimson.

rulings.text: If a nonbasic land has an ability that triggers “when” it enters the battlefield, it will lose that ability before it can trigger.

If a nonbasic land has an ability that causes it to enter the battlefield tapped, it will lose that ability before it can apply. The same is also true of any other abilities that modify how a land enters the battlefield or apply “as” a land enters the battlefield, such as the first ability of Cavern of Souls.
Nonbasic lands will lose any other land types and abilities they had. They will gain the land type Mountain and gain the ability “{T}: Add {R}.”
This effect doesn't affect names or supertypes. It won't turn any land into a basic land or remove the legendary supertype from a legendary land, and the lands won't be named “Mountain.”

cards.name: Furnace of Rath
cards.text: If a source would deal damage to a permanent or player, it deals double that damage to that permanent or player instead.
cards.flavorText: The furnace awaits the next master who would stoke the fires of apocalypse.

rulings.text: If a spell or ability damages multiple things, divide up the damage before applying this effect. This means you can’t normally end up with an odd amount of damage on something.
The trample rules cause damage to be divided before it is doubled.
If you have two of these on the battlefield, the damage is multiplied by 4.
The multiplied damage counts in all ways as if it came from the original source. Furnace of Rath is not the source.

If multiple effects modify how damage will be dealt, the player who would be dealt damage or the controller of the creature that would be dealt damage chooses the order to apply the effects. For example, Mending Hands says, “Prevent the next 4 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.” Suppose a spell would deal 5 damage to a player who has cast Mending Hands targeting themselves. That player can either (a) prevent 4 damage first and then let Furnace of Rath double the remaining 1 damage, taking 2 damage, or (b) double the damage to 10 and then prevent 4 damage, taking 6 damage.

rulings.text: If you manage to cast this during a main phase of your opponent’s turn, that opponent’s creatures will untap and that opponent will be able to attack again. It will not allow you to attack during their turn.

It only creates an additional combat and main phase if it resolves during a main phase.

cards.name: Booby Trap
cards.text:
As Booby Trap enters the battlefield, choose an opponent and a card name other than a basic land card name.
The chosen player reveals each card they draw.
When the chosen player draws a card with the chosen name, sacrifice Booby Trap. If you do, Booby Trap deals 10 damage to that player.

rulings.text: The “if you do” part is only done if you successfully sacrifice this card. In other words, it has to be on the battlefield when the trigger resolves or it does not deal damage.
The choice of which card to name is part of the resolution of the spell or ability which puts Booby Trap onto the battlefield. It can’t be countered.
If an effect causes the player to draw multiple cards, each card is revealed as it’s drawn. If Booby Trap’s ability triggers, it will go on the stack once the card-drawing effect has concluded.
If a single Booby Trap’s ability triggers multiple times, then only the first ability to resolve causes Booby Trap to be sacrificed and damage to be dealt.
If Booby Trap’s last ability is countered, Booby Trap remains on the battlefield (and no damage is dealt).

cards.name: Coat of Arms
cards.text: Each creature gets +1/+1 for each other creature on the battlefield that shares at least one creature type with it. (For example, if two Goblin Warriors and a Goblin Shaman are on the battlefield, each gets +2/+2.)
cards.flavorText:
"Hup, two, three, four,
Dunno how to count no more."

rulings.text: If a creature has more than one creature type, and one of those types matches the creature you are calculating for, then count that creature. Only one type needs to match in order to get counted.
If you have a creature with more than one creature type, count all creatures which have either creature type.
Sharing multiple creature types doesn’t give an additional bonus. Coat of Arms counts creatures, not creature types.

cards.name: Fellwar Stone
cards.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color that a land an opponent controls could produce.
cards.flavorText:
"What do you have that I cannot obtain?"
—Mairsil, the Pretender

rulings.text: This works even if the opponent's lands are tapped. It only checks what kinds of mana can be produced, not if the abilities that produce them are usable right now.
The ability can be activated if the opponent has no lands that produce mana, but the effect will not be able to generate any mana.
It only produces one mana even if the land can produce more than one.
The colors of mana are white, blue, black, red, and green. Fellwar Stone can't be tapped for colorless mana, even if a land an opponent controls could produce colorless mana.

Fellwar Stone checks the effects of all mana-producing abilities of lands your opponents control, but it doesn't check their costs. For example, Vivid Crag has the ability “{T}, Remove a charge counter from Vivid Crag: Add one mana of any color.” If an opponent controls Vivid Crag and you control Fellwar Stone, you can tap Fellwar Stone for any color of mana. It doesn't matter whether Vivid Crag has a charge counter on it, and it doesn't matter whether it's untapped.

When determining what colors of mana your opponents' lands could produce, take into account any applicable replacement effects that would apply to those lands' mana abilities (such as Contamination's effect, for example). If there is more than one, consider them in any possible order.

Fellwar Stone doesn't care about any restrictions or riders your opponents' lands (such as Ancient Ziggurat or Hall of the Bandit Lord) put on the mana they produce. It just cares about colors of mana.

cards.name: Jade Statue
cards.text: {2}: Jade Statue becomes a 3/6 Golem artifact creature until end of combat. Activate only during combat.
cards.flavorText:
"The paradox of jade statues is that their victims never really expect attack, but they are never completely surprised either."
—Kabel, Tolarian archivist

rulings.text: It can only make itself into a creature during combat phases and therefore it is difficult to get Auras placed on it.

A delayed triggered ability that refers to Jade Statue still affects it even if it’s no longer a creature. For example, if Jade Statue blocks the Kashi-Tribe Warriors (“Whenever Kashi-Tribe Warriors deals combat damage to a creature, tap that creature and it doesn’t untap during its controller’s next untap step.”), the Warriors’ effect stops Jade Statue from untapping.
If Jade Statue’s ability has been activated, abilities that trigger “at end of combat” will see Jade Statue as an artifact creature.

A noncreature permanent that turns into a creature can attack, and its {T} abilities can be activated, only if its controller has continuously controlled that permanent since the beginning of their most recent turn. It doesn’t matter how long the permanent has been a creature.

If Jade Statue is animated by some other effect, you get an artifact creature with whatever power, toughness, and creature types (if any) are specified by that effect. If you subsequently use Jade Statue’s ability during combat, it will become 3/6 and gain the creature type Golem in addition to those creature types until end of combat.

cards.name: Millstone
cards.text: {2}, {T}: Target player mills two cards.
cards.flavorText: More than one mage has been driven insane by the sound of the millstone relentlessly grinding away.

rulings.text: Can be used on a player with less than 2 cards in their library. It will remove 0 or 1 cards if that is all that is available.
It is not a draw effect so it will not cause a player with less than 2 cards in their library to lose.
Since you are putting more than one card in the graveyard at one time, the affected player can choose the order the 2 cards go in.

cards.name: Spellbook
cards.text: You have no maximum hand size.
cards.flavorText:
"Everything the wise woman learned she wrote in a book, and when the pages were black with ink, she took white ink and began again."
—Karn, silver golem

rulings.text: If multiple effects modify your hand size, apply them in timestamp order. For example, if you put Null Profusion (an enchantment that says your maximum hand size is two) onto the battlefield and then put Spellbook onto the battlefield, you’ll have no maximum hand size. However, if those permanents entered the battlefield in the opposite order, your maximum hand size would be two.

cards.name: Storage Matrix
cards.text: As long as Storage Matrix is untapped, each player chooses artifact, creature, or land during their untap step. That player can untap only permanents of the chosen type this step.

rulings.text: This card’s ability does not override effects which prevent a permanent from untapping.
Permanents with multiple types untap if any of their types is chosen. For example, an artifact creature untaps if either artifact or creature is chosen.

If another effect limits the number of permanents that untap, that number combines with Storage Matrix’s effect. For example, Imi Statue says “players can’t untap more than one artifact during their untap steps.” If both Imi Statue and an untapped Storage Matrix are on the battlefield, and you choose “artifact,” only one artifact untaps.

cards.name: Yavimaya Coast
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add {G} or {U}. Yavimaya Coast deals 1 damage to you.

rulings.text: The damage dealt to you is part of the second mana ability. It doesn’t use the stack and can’t be responded to.
Like most lands, each land in this cycle is colorless. The damage dealt to you is dealt by a colorless source.
